[Cite as 05/06/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-2244.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

May 6, 2003

MEDIATION REFERRALS

2003-0645. State ex rel. Hall v. Midwest Drywall, Inc.

The following cases have been referred to mediation pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6):

Franklin App. No. 02AP-500, 2003-Ohio-821.
